name: Lalu Kumar
summary: Full Stack Developer skilled in Java, Spring Boot, React, and Node.js with a strong focus on building scalable, AI-driven, and data-intensive web applications. Experienced in both frontend and backend development, RESTful API design, cloud deployment, and version control.

education.institution: Maulana Mazharul Haque Arabic and Persian University

experience.title: Full Stack Java Trainee
details: Trained in Full Stack Java Development focusing on Spring Boot, JPA, and Hibernate.
Built REST APIs using Spring Boot and integrated MySQL/Oracle via JPA.
Developed web apps using JSP, Servlets, and React; implemented session-based secure CRUD operations.
Worked with Git, Postman, Eclipse, and IntelliJ, following version control workflows.

projects.title: Revisely: AI-Powered Study & Revision Platform
projects.summary: An AI-powered learning assistant for PDF-based study material using RAG and Gemini API.
projects.content: Developed using React, FastAPI, and MongoDB. Implemented AI PDF chat, quiz generation, Pinecone vector search, Firebase Auth, and progress tracking dashboards.

projects.title: Video Interview Proctoring System
projects.summary: AI-powered system for remote interview monitoring and integrity reporting.
projects.content: Used TensorFlow.js and MediaPipe to detect suspicious activities during interviews, integrated with real-time dashboards via Socket.io.

projects.title: Email Trace Analyzer
projects.summary: Analyzes email headers to identify the sender’s email service provider.
projects.content: Built with Next.js and NestJS, integrated IMAP for auto-fetching incoming emails, deployed on Vercel and Render.

projects.title: Employee Management System
projects.summary: A CRUD web app for managing employee records with React and Spring Boot.
projects.content: Developed REST APIs with Spring Data JPA and integrated with a React frontend using Axios.

projects.title: AI Course Generator
projects.summary: Automatically generates course structures using Gemini AI and Clerk authentication.
projects.content: Built with Next.js, integrated Gemini API for course creation, Drizzle ORM for persistence, and Cloudinary for media.

projects.title: AskDocAI
projects.summary: AI-powered document analysis assistant using Gemini AI.
projects.content: Analyzes uploaded documents and provides summaries and insights directly in the browser.
